rules.name: Zpracov_no_s_chybou_i_bez_chyby
rules.label: Zpracováno s chybou či bez chyby

decisions.name: Is_New_Portfolio_Manager_Lightning_user
decisions.label: Is New Portfolio Manager Lightning user

decisions.name: Is_Regional_Manager_Assistant_Lightning_user
decisions.label: Is Regional Manager Assistant Lightning user

decisions.name: Portfolio_Manager_is_not_empty
decisions.label: New Portfolio Manager is not empty

decisions.name: Regional_Manager_is_not_empty_and_active
decisions.label: Regional Manager is not empty and Active

formulas.name: Value_CekaNaSchvaleni
formulas.expression: "Žádost č. " & {!$Record.CaseNumber} & " o převod SPS ze dne " & TEXT({!$Record.CreatedDate}) & " čeká na schválení."

formulas.name: Value_OdmitnutoZpracovani
formulas.expression: "Žádost č. " & {!$Record.CaseNumber} & " ze dne " & TEXT({!$Record.CreatedDate}) & " se nepodařilo provést. Kontaktujte Helpdesk."

formulas.name: Value_Zpracovana
formulas.expression: "Žádost SPS č. " + {!$Record.CaseNumber} + " zpracována. Celkový počet klientů " + TEXT({!$Record.TotalRequestsNumber__c}) + ", bez chyby " + TEXT({!$Record.SuccessRequestsNumber__c}) + ", s chybou " + TEXT({!$Record.FailedRequestsNumber__c})

Flow.label: CASE Send Portfolio Management Request Status Change Notifications
